about_the_game:
Contains the soundtrack from both Warlock - The master of Arcane and Warlock 2 - The Exiled, totally 25 songs.

Warlock - The Master of Arcane includes following songs:

  • Credits
  • Main Theme
  • The Humans - Part One
  • The Humans - Part Two
  • The Humans - Part Three
  • The Monsters - Part One
  • The Monsters - Part Two
  • The Monsters - Part Three
  • Pocket World
  • The Undead - Part One
  • The Undead - Part Two
  • The Undead - Part Three

Warlock - The Exiled includes following songs:

  • Credits
  • The Svarts Theme
  • The Svarts Theme - Part Two
  • Intro
  • Main Theme
  • The Planesstriders Theme
  • The Planesstriders Theme - Part Two
  • Ainadra
  • Autumn World
  • Crystal World
  • Ice World
  • Desert World
  • Tropical World
